doc.field: Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland

Topics include: Board Meeting (March 28, 2013); DHD Member Profiles (Elbrun Kimmelman, Mary Van Buren, Firth Fabend, Pamela Meyjes); Social Register article; Board Meetings (September 12 and 27, 2013); Board Meeting at Home of Mrs. Thomas E. Slattery (October 4, 2013); Board Meeting (October 23, 2013); Frick Collection Tour and Luncheon (November 14, 2013); Board Meeting and Christmas Party (December 22, 2013); Paper "Windows on Dutch History" by Elbrun Kimmelman; Annual Meeting & Tea (April 24, 2013); Paas Heritage Ball.
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Series I. Governance >> Subseries I.D. Officers' files >> Officers' files | Elbrun Kimmelman
